messages.title: A strong voice for Arundel & South Downs
messages.content: Dear Resident, I am writing to update you on a number of the key issues on which I have been working on your behalf. ... I am determined to do what I can to look after their interests. Over the past ten years I have worked at Westminster from Monday to Thursday each week, and from Friday to Sunday I have worked in the constituency, based in Arundel where I live. I hope that you will find this report a useful source of information about local issues, as well as what I have done to represent you in Parliament. I pledge to work hard for everyone in the constituency, to stand up for local people, and to be a strong voice at Westminster for your concerns.

leaflet.personalStatement: Over the past ten years I have served as MP for the fantastic rural constituency of Arundel & South Downs, which covers 250 square miles, a far larger area than the Isle of Wight. We are all very proud of the villages and small market towns in which we live, and I am determined to do what I can to look after their interests.

politicalExperience.achievements: Working in the constituency based in Arundel where I live, from Friday to Sunday; Representation in Parliament.

images.caption: Nick Herbert with a message for the residents of Arundel & South Downs

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet does not contain explicit election date, mention of party leader, other party leaders, tactical situation, or detailed key policies and issues. It is a general introductory letter rather than a detailed manifesto or policy document.
